problem_text_cn: 如图在一块长为12m,宽为6m的长方形草地上,有一条弯曲的柏油小路(小路任何地方的水平宽度都是2m)则空白部分表示的草地面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, on a rectangular grass with a length of N_0 and a width of N_1, there is a curved asphalt path (the horizontal width of any part of the path is N_2), and the grass area represented by the blank part is ()
raw_answer: 把矩形小路左边的部分沿小路向右平移2m构成一个新矩形,草地面积=新矩形的面积=(12-2)×6=60故选B
